overview: The Beagles and the Hickses are two mountain families that have been feuding all their lives. The Hickses come up with a plan to get rid of their enemies once and for all by hiring two sharpshooters to finish them off. Turns out that the "sharpshooters" aren't quite all they're cracked up to be, resulting in some unintended consequences.
tagline: WHEN YOU AIM AT THIS COMEDY YOU'VE HIT A BULLSEYE
title: The Big Killing
